Description.zhCN:
莫比斯基础工作单位。用于采集资源、建造建筑和修理。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
Moebius basic work unit. Used to gather resources, build structures, and repair.

Can target the ground.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам двигаться в указанную точку или следовать за указанной целью. При этом они не будут вступать в бой с возможным противником.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам прекратить выполнение всех задач и остановиться.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам оставаться на месте и атаковать противника в зоне досягаемости, при этом не преследуя его и не приближаясь к нему, чтобы вступить в бой.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам двигаться в выбранную точку, вступая в бой с противниками, которые встретятся по пути. Указав в качестве цели конкретную боевую единицу, вы прикажете атаковать ее до уничтожения.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам курсировать между текущей позицией и выбранной точкой. Обнаружив противника, они будут приближаться на расстояние атаки и вступать в бой.

Tooltip.zhCN: 为机械单位和建筑恢复生命值。修理消耗资源降低，修理速度相当于传统修理方式的两倍。
Tooltip.enUS: Restores health to mechanical units and buildings. Repair resources are reduced, and the repair speed is twice that of traditional repair methods.
Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказывает КСМ добывать ресурсы на месторождении минералов или из веспенового гейзера.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выгрузить ресурсы в ближайший приемный пункт.

Tooltip.enUS: A list of basic structures.
Tooltip.ruRU: Открывает список основных строений.

Tooltip.enUS: A list of advanced structures.
Tooltip.ruRU: Открывает список дополнительных строений.

Tooltip.enUS: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приостановить сооружение этого строения. Впоследствии его можно будет продолжить.

Tooltip.zhCN: 采集距离延长，采集速度加快。维修速度翻倍。
Tooltip.enUS: The collection distance is extended and the collection speed is accelerated. Repairs are made twice as fast.

Tooltip.zhCN: 拥有更高的生命与护甲。
Tooltip.enUS: Has higher health and armor.

Name.zhCN: 建造军团指挥中心

Tooltip.zhCN:
主要建筑
用于生产工作单位与接收采集到的资源。能够装载重型武装工程车。

开启：
- 重型武装工程车
Tooltip.enUS:
Main Building
Used for producing work units and receiving collected resources. Able to load heavy armed engineering vehicles.

Open:
- Heavy armed engineering vehicle

Name.zhCN: 建造自动化军团精炼厂

Tooltip.zhCN:
基础建筑
改良型精炼厂，能够无需通过工作单位自动采集高能瓦斯。
Tooltip.enUS:
Basic Building
An improved refinery that can automatically collect high-energy gas without going through the work unit.

Tooltip.zhCN:
基础建筑
建造在瓦斯气泉上，用于采集高能瓦斯。
Tooltip.enUS:
Basic building
is built on a gas spring and is used to collect high-energy gas.

Name.zhCN: 轨道空投：军团补给站

Tooltip.zhCN: 改良型补给站。可以在空投后快速完成部署。节省了建造所消耗的时间。
Tooltip.enUS: Improved supply depot. Deployment can be completed quickly after airdrop. Saves time spent on construction.

Tooltip.zhCN:
基础建筑
提供补给。
拥有补给是生产更多单位的前提。
军团补给站可以降下，允许地面单位出入。
Tooltip.enUS:
Basic buildings
provide supplies.
Having supplies is a prerequisite for producing more units.
The Legion Supply Depot can be lowered, allowing ground units to enter and exit.

Tooltip.zhCN:
生产建筑
莫比斯步兵训练设施。

开启：
- 军团陆战队员
- 使重型武装工程车可以建造军团碉堡
- 使重型武装工程车可以建造军团机械工厂
- 使军团指挥中心可以升级为军团轨道调度基地
Tooltip.enUS:
Production Building
Moebius Infantry Training Facility.

Enable:
- Legion Marine
- Use Heavy Armed Engineering Vehicle can build Legion Bunker
- using Heavy Armed Engineering Vehicle can build Legion Machinery Factory
- enables Legion Command The center can be upgraded to Legion Orbital Dispatch Base

Name.zhCN: 建造莫比斯工程部

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
解锁莫比斯防御建筑。

开启：
- 使重型武装工程车可以建造军团镭射塔
- 使重型武装工程车可以建造军团感应塔
- 使军团指挥中心可升级为军团要塞
Tooltip.enUS:
Tech Building
Unlocks the Moebius defense building.

Enable:
- Enables Heavy Armed Engineering Vehicle to be builtLegion Laser Tower
- Allows Heavy Armed Engineering Vehicle to be constructedLegion Sensor Tower
- Allows Legion Command Center to be upgraded to Legion Fortress

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
步兵单位能够进入其内作战。

效果加成：舱载单位射程增加1。

可以对地和对空。
Tooltip.enUS:
Defensive Building
Infantry units can enter and fight inside.

Effect bonus: The range of the mounted unit is increased by 1.

Can be used against ground and air.

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
莫比斯主要防空建筑。

可以对空。
侦测单位
Tooltip.enUS:
Defense Building
Moebius's main anti-aircraft building.

Can be empty.
Detection unit

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
能够显示大范围内敌方单位的位置。
侦测单位
Tooltip.enUS:
Defensive buildings
can display the location of enemy units in a large area.
Detection unit
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Name.zhCN: 建造莫比斯特别行动处
Name.enUS: Construction of Moebius Special Operations Branch

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
解锁更多莫比斯高级单位。

开启：
- 使莫比斯军营可以折跃幽鬼小队
- 使莫比斯军营可以折跃亡灵小队
Tooltip.enUS:
Tech Building
Unlock more advanced Moebius units.

Enable:
- Allows Moebius Barracks to warp Ghost Squad
- Allows Moebius Barracks to warp Dead Squad

Name.zhCN: 建造莫比斯机械工厂

Tooltip.zhCN:
生产建筑
莫比斯地面机械部队生产设施。

开启：
- 狱焰骑士
- 使重型武装工程车可以建造莫比斯舰队空港
- 使重型武装工程车可以建造莫比斯高级军备站
Tooltip.enUS:
Production Building
Moebius Ground Machinery Force production facility.

Enable:
- Hellfire Knight
- Use< c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Heavy Armed Engineering Vehicle can build Moebius Fleet Airport
- use Heavy Armed Engineering Vehicle can build Moebius Advanced Armament Station

Name.zhCN: 建造莫比斯高级军备站
Name.enUS: Construction of Moebius Advanced Arms Station

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启莫比斯终极地面机械单位。

开启：
- 使莫比斯机械工厂可以折跃军团超重型攻城坦克
- 使莫比斯机械工厂可以折跃洛基MK.II
Tooltip.enUS:
Technology Building
Activate Moebius, the ultimate ground machine unit.

Enable:
- Allows Moebius Machine Factory to warp< c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Legion Super Heavy Siege Tank
- Allows Moebius Machine Factory to warp Rocky MK.II

Name.zhCN: 建造莫比斯舰队空港

Tooltip.zhCN:
生产建筑
莫比斯空中单位生产设施。

开启：
- 隐秘运载机
- 使重型武装工程车可以建造莫比斯聚变反应堆
Tooltip.enUS:
Production Building
Moebius air unit production facility.

Enable:
- Stealth Carrier
- Use< c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Heavy Armed Engineering Vehicle can build Moebius Fusion Reactor

Name.zhCN: 建造莫比斯聚变反应堆
Name.enUS: Construction of the Moebius Fusion Reactor

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启莫比斯终极空中单位。

开启：
- 使莫比斯舰队空港可以折跃暗影级战列巡航舰
- 使莫比斯舰队空港可以折跃军团突击运载母舰
Tooltip.enUS:
Technology Building
Activates Moebius, the ultimate aerial unit.

Enable:
- Enables Moebius Fleet Airport to warp< c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Shadow-class Battlecruiser
- Allows Moebius Fleet Airport to warpLegion Assault Carrier
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
